title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Problem-Solving Education Design and Evaluation Based on Vibrotactile Interfaces

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners understand the design principles of Vibro-Haptic Interfaces (VHIM) and derive customized interface elements aligned with autistic children's learning preferences
Learners can develop educational scenarios for enhancing social interaction by applying problem-solving instructional design models to VR simulation environments
Learners design structured problem-solving strategies based on information processing theory and measure learning effectiveness through formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
